com.foreach.imageserver.client

Class Md5ImageRequestHashBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.imageserver.client.Md5ImageRequestHashBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageRequestHashBuilder

    public class Md5ImageRequestHashBuilder
extends Object
implements ImageRequestHashBuilder
    Default implementation of ImageRequestHashBuilder that calculates a uses an MD5 hash of all parameters including an additional custom hash token.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Md5ImageRequestHashBuilder(@NonNull String hashToken)
      Create a new builder instance for creating MD5 hashes of all paremeters including an additional specified token.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Md5ImageRequestHashBuilder

        public Md5ImageRequestHashBuilder(@NonNull
                                  @NonNull String hashToken)
        Create a new builder instance for creating MD5 hashes of all paremeters including an additional specified token. If the server uses the same token it should be able to verify the generated hash codes.
        Parameters:
        hashToken - that will be added to the parameters when building the hash

    • Method Detail

      • calculateHash

        public String calculateHash(String context,
                            String ratio,
                            ImageResolutionDto imageResolution,
                            ImageVariantDto imageVariant,
                            String... size)
        Description copied from interface: ImageRequestHashBuilder
        Calculate a security hash of the different parameters. Result can be empty if no hash could be calculated.
        Specified by:
        calculateHash in interface ImageRequestHashBuilder
        Parameters:
        context - of the image
        ratio - can be null
        imageResolution - can be null
        imageVariant - requested - can be null
        size - can be empty
        Returns:
        calculated hash
